Checklists

Good checklists to go through!

📝 BOM : Bill of Materials for electrical, mechanical and power 💰 Buying : Before buying a breakout board, component, etc 📄 Datasheets : Good practices to incorporate in a datasheet 🎛 Footprints : Create component footprints from scratch 🔀 Layouts : Making complete PCB layouts 🏭 PCB Manufacturing : Check with PCB manufacturer's capabilities and specifications 🕸 Computer Networking : Things to check for WiFi connectivity to the devices 📆 Schedule : Checklist for various activities for each phase of the schedule 📑 Schematic : Good schematics checklist © Standards : Standard parts and processes to use across projects Ω Symbols : Creating symbols in an ECAD software 🪝 Semantic Versioning : How to version the PCB schematic and layout
